title: How to Make an Alexander Cocktail

steps.headline: Pour the cognac into a cocktail shaker.
Add the dark creme de cacao to the shaker.
Add the cream to the shaker.
Fill to the top with ice.

text: Pour the cognac into a cocktail shaker.  Add the dark creme de cacao to the shaker.  Add the cream to the shaker.  Fill to the top with ice.  Shake well.  Strain into a cocktail glass.  (Optional) Garnish with some nutmeg.
